body.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
body.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!

body.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
body.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I now live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.

body.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
body.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!

body.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
body.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I now live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
